Package hotciv.view

Class Summary
CityFigure  
CivDrawing CivDrawing is a specialized Drawing (model component) from MiniDraw that dynamically builds the list of Figures for MiniDraw to render the Unit and other information objects that are visible in the Game instance.
GfxConstants Constants to be accessible by all graphics handling abstractions and coordination mappings.
MapView MapView: A MiniDraw DrawingView specializing in drawing the background for a HotCiv Game world including the matrix of tiles.
TextFigure A figure representing a text.
UnitFigure UnitFigure is a MiniDraw figure that draws the graphics associated with the proper images for HotCiv, and overlays some graphics that tells ownership and move count left for the unit.
